channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Missouri woman offered $18 refund after Amazon delivery partner damages garage, car — how she won what she was owed
Jimmy Kimmel Says ‘I Did Get Italian Citizenship’ Because Trump’s Presidency ‘Is as Bad as You Thought It Was Gonna Be. It’s So Much Worse’
Kodak cautions there's 'substantial doubt' about its ability to stay in business
Musk says he plans to sue Apple for not featuring X or Grok among its top apps
item.description: Billionaire SpaceX, Tesla and X owner Elon Musk says he plans to sue Apple for not featuring X and its Grok artificial intelligence chatbot app in its...

item.title: Plane crashes into parked aircraft while landing at airport, sparking fire
item.description: A small plane landing at a Montana airport has crashed into aircraft on the ground, causing a large fire but no serious injuries

item.title: FIFA moves ahead with new human rights strategy for World Cup games, but advocates are skeptical
item.description: FIFA is testing a new protocol for the 2026 World Cup in North America, requiring host committees to develop human rights action plans

item.title: UN-backed investigators allege torture and sex crimes in Myanmar detention facilities
item.description: A U.N.-backed investigator says his team has turned up significant evidence of “systemic torture” in Myanmar’s detention centers, including electric s...

item.title: Man admits trying to smuggle 850 protected turtles valued at $1.4 million to Hong Kong
item.description: A man admitted trying to smuggle protected turtles worth more than $1 million from New York City to Hong Kong
